title: Kenneth Lay Meets with Dick Cheney for Energy Task Force Policy Discussion
summary: Enron CEO Kenneth Lay met privately with Vice President Dick Cheney to discuss energy policy, presenting a three-page memo with corporate recommendations. The meeting resulted in the Energy Task Force adopting multiple Enron-favorable policies, including opposition to price caps and recommendations for federal transmission line control. This meeting exemplified the extensive corporate influence on the Bush administration's energy policy formulation.

sources.title: Cheney Reveals Enron Meeting - ABC News
